sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card class="pb-3">
        <v-card-title>Reservar</v-card-title>
        <form>
            <v-col
                cols="12"
                sm="12"
                md="12"
                class="px-7 mb-n7"
            >
                <v-dialog
                    ref="dialog"
                    v-model="modal"
                    persistent
                    width="290px"
                >
                    <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                        <v-text-field
                        v-model="dateFormat"
                        label="Data"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-calendar"
                        readonly
                        v-bind="attrs"
                        v-on="on"
                        ></v-text-field>
                    </template>
                    <v-date-picker
                        v-model="date"
                        scrollable
                        locale="pt-br"
                    >
                        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                        <v-btn
                            text
                            color="primary"
                            @click="modal = false"
                        >
                        Cancel
                        </v-btn>
                        <v-btn
                            text
                            color="primary"
                            @click="CalendarSave(dateFormat)"
                        >
                        OK
                        </v-btn>
                    </v-date-picker>
                </v-dialog>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
                cols="12"
                sm="12"
                md="12"
                class="px-7 my-n5"
            >
                <v-dialog
                
                    ref="dialog"
                    v-model="modal2"
                    :return-value.sync="time"
                    persistent
                    width="290px"
                >
                    <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="time"
                        label="Horário"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
                        readonly
                        v-bind="attrs"
                        v-on="on"
                    ></v-text-field>
                    </template>
                    <v-time-picker
                        v-if="modal2"
                        v-model="time"
                        full-width
                        format="24hr"
                    >
                    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                    <v-btn
                        
                        color="primary"
                        @click="modal2 = false"
                    >
                        Cancel
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        text
                        color="primary"
                        @click="$refs.dialog.save(time)"
                    >
                        OK
                    </v-btn>
                    </v-time-picker>
                </v-dialog>
            </v-col>
            <v-select
                :items="periodo"
                label="Periodo"
                prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-eight"
                class="px-7"
                v-if="time != null"
            ></v-select>
            <v-text-field
                prepend-icon="mdi-account-plus"
                label="Quantidade Pessoas"
                class="px-7"
                required
                type="number"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-select
                v-model="comemoracao"
                :items="items"
                label="Comemoração"
                prepend-icon="mdi-party-popper"
                class="px-7"
                
            ></v-select>
            <v-text-field
                v-model="descricao"
                prepend-icon="mdi-message-arrow-right"
                label="Descrição"
                class="px-7"
                v-if="DesabilitarCampoDscricao()"
            >
            </v-text-field>
            <v-row class="px-10 py-7">
                <v-btn
                    outlined
                    large
                    block
                    color="green"
                    @click="Logar()"
                    >
                    Confirmar
                </v-btn>
            </v-row>
        </form>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'AgendarComponent',
    data: vm => ({
        date: (new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substring(0, 10),
        dateFormat : vm.FormatDate((new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substring(0, 10)),
        modal2: false,
        time: null,
        modal: false,
        comemoracao: "Não",
        descricao: null,
        items: ['Sim', 'Não'],
        periodo: ['Manhã', 'Tarde', "Noite"],
    }),

    methods: {
        CalendarSave(date) {
            this.$refs.dialog.save(this.FormatDate(date))
            this.modal = false
        },
        FormatDate(date) {
            if (!date) return null

            console.log(this.date)

            const [year, month, day] = date.split('-')
            return `${day}/${month}/${year}`
        },
        DesabilitarCampoDscricao() {
            if(this.comemoracao != 'Sim')
            {
                this.descricao = null;
                return true
            }
        
            return false            
        }
    },

    watch: {
      date (val) {
        this.dateFormat = this.FormatDate(this.date)
      },
    },
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
